column5: I used to watch this show all the time when I lived in Eastern Ontario and Montreal.  this guy fishes in small boats, doesn't look like a Shimano Cadet, and doesn't go on and on and on (Charlie Wray type) about his sponsored equipment.  Best of all, he fished some of the waters I could get to. St Lawrence, Lake Champlain, Ottawa River, Lake Memphremagog to mention a few.  I couldn't find the Streamside episodes but here is the Host. Some interesting links.  Oh yea, very educational and he doesnt use million dollar Equipment.
I also like his partner Bill Safe of Rod and Reel

I always thought "Fishing with John" was the best fishing show ever. It was more of an adventure and less of commercial. Here is a clip from youtube of John fishing Jamaica with Tom Waits.  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a3GRtOkmOo4...=PL&index=2
You thought right, my friend. They are all great -- ice fishing with Willem Dafoe, Thailand with Dennis Hopper, etc. etc.
